Kirim

Korean: 이기림

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Lee Ki Rim
Native name:
이기림
Birthday:
May 10, 1991
Age:
33 years old
Group (2015-2017):
WABLE

Introduction

Lee Ki Rim (이기림) is a South Korean singer and pianist under Kemical Record. She is one half of the sister duo WABLE. Her younger sister is Lee Pu Reum, who is also in WABLE.
